channel.title: Blender on CamMakoJ
channel.description: Recent content in Blender on CamMakoJ

item.title: Blender Topography Maps of Alberta
item.description: Acquiring Our Data I have seen some really cool applications of DEM models in blender. I have done a bit of messing around in blender previously, however it’s been awhile and I never really got very good at it. So we shall see how this goes, but i’m taking a crack at importing the province of Alberta’s 25m DEM from Altalis. It is a public dataset so if you want to snag it head here Altalis.
